backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a party ledger system with party management, payment tracking, location-based visit records, staff accounts, access control, and blob storage for shop branding.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, utilities, and pages describing authentication, party management, payment tracking, branding, reports, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Party Ledger application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with TanStack Router setup, Internet Identity authentication flow, actor session management, profile setup dialog, and route definitions for dashboard, parties, visits, reports, and settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddAdminPr: Dialog component for adding new admin principals with Principal ID validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrinc: Admin panel displaying list of admin principals with add/remove functionality, current user highlighting, and protection against removing the last admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffManag: Component for managing staff accounts (file content truncated).
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Dialog component that displays parties with payments due today, allowing users to view individual party details by navigating to the party page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen component displaying an access denied message with an optional custom reason when users lack required permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when application initialization fails, providing retry and reload options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen component that uses Internet Identity authentication with a branded card layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen displayed when user profile loading fails, offering retry and reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for new users to enter their name during initial profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/auth/ResetAdminP: Empty file placeholder for admin password reset dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StaffLoginS: Empty file placeholder for staff login screen component.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner and customizable message shown during application startup.
frontend/src/components/auth/TopLevelErr: React error boundary component that catches top-level errors and displays a self-contained error UI with reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Header component displaying shop logo and name from branding settings, with fallback to default values.
Settings card for managing shop branding including name and logo upload with progress tracking using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Card component for importing parties from CSV files, parsing data, previewing errors, and batch-adding parties with ID generation.
Main application shell component providing navigation, header with branding, logout functionality, and footer. Renders navigation items for Dashboard, Parties, New Visit, Reports, and Settings with responsive design.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: Dialog component for adding or editing party records with fields for name, address, phone, PAN, and due amount. Handles party ID generation for new parties and validation before submission.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog for recording payments with amount, comment, and optional next payment date fields. Requires next payment date when amount is zero and validates input before submission.
Displays a list of payment records with metadata including payment ID, next payment date indicator, and location saved status. Shows empty state when no payments exist.
frontend/src/components/settings/Princip: Card component displaying the user's Internet Identity Principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality. Shows authentication status and provides instructions for sharing with administrators.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: Card component for exporting and importing application data as JSON files. Supports merge and overwrite import modes for data transfer between devices.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog for recording party visits with payment amount, comment, visit date/time, next payment date, and automatic geolocation capture. Validates inputs and handles location permission states.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: Provides React context for managing backend actor session state, including loading states, errors, and a stable principal key for query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPrinc: React Query hooks for managing admin principals (get, add, remove) and checking if the caller is an admin, with temporary type casting until backend interface is regenerated.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile (name) with caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: React Query hooks for getting and setting shop branding (name and logo) with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on parties (customers), including validation, ID generation, and fetching all or individual party records.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: React Query hooks for fetching party visit records and recording payments or visits with location data, invalidating related caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: React Query hook for fetching staff account permissions by login name, with fallback handling for non-admin users.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: React Query hook that aggregates today's party visits across all parties, calculating total count and amount with automatic refresh every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: React Query hooks for exporting and importing upgrade data with cache invalidation on import.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: React Query hook that creates the backend actor with retry logic and error handling, initializing access control with admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Simplified hook for managing due-today alerts with dismissal state; full implementation disabled to avoid performance issues from fetching all party payment records.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffAuth.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for staff authentication logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like cards, buttons, borders, and charts.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: Parses CSV files to extract party data (name, address, phone, PAN, due amount) with validation and error reporting for bulk party imports.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting and parsing monetary amounts in Indian Rupees, phone numbers, and PAN numbers.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Utility functions to normalize phone numbers and create tel: links for clickable phone numbers.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Time conversion utilities between JavaScript Date objects and ICP Time (nanoseconds), plus formatting functions for datetime-local inputs and display.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Handles JSON export/import of UpgradeData (parties, visit records, branding) with bigint serialization and merge logic for data transfer between canisters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying today's visit summary statistics (count, total amount) and a list of all visits with party details and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Page for creating new party visits with searchable party list and dialog form for recording visit details when a party is selected.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of all parties with their basic info (name, phone, PAN, due amount) in a card grid layout. Includes functionality to add new parties via dialog and navigate to individual party details.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single party including contact details, due amount, and payment history. Provides actions to edit, delete, call, record payments, and schedule party visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays payment analytics and history for a selected party, showing party summary (due amount, total payments) and latest payment details with visit information.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Tabbed settings interface with sections for profile, branding, Excel import, data transfer (JSON), and admin panel (conditionally shown for admin users).
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific party visit record including amount, date/time, comments, next payment date, and location with map link.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Empty utility file, likely placeholder for staff session management functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with container settings, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an e-commerce shop with Internet Identity authentication, identifying admin Principal registration issues, and defining three pending feature requests to auto-register first user as admin, validate admin checks, and add debug logging.
